name: Site Supervision Subcontract
description: On-site supervision and management services for construction activities
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Baustellenaufsichtsunterauftragsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Baustellenaufsicht für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Site Supervision Subcontract (the \"Agreement\") governs site supervision for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Sous-contrat de Supervision de Site (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la supervision de site pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: EPC (Engineering, Procurement, Construction)
description: Comprehensive contract covering engineering, procurement, and construction with various pricing models
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser EPC-Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") umfasst Ingenieursleistungen, Beschaffung und Bau für [Projekt] mit [Preismodell]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This EPC Contract (the \"Contract\") covers engineering, procurement, and construction for [Project] with [Pricing Model]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat EPC (le \"Contrat\") couvre l\"ingénierie, l\"approvisionnement et la construction pour [Projet] avec [Modèle de Prix]..."}]}

name: Parent Company Guarantee
description: Corporate guarantee from parent company securing subsidiary contractor obligations
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Muttergesellschaftsgarantie (die \"Garantie\") sichert die Verpflichtungen der Tochtergesellschaft [Contractor] durch [Muttergesellschaft]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Parent Company Guarantee (the \"Guarantee\") secures the obligations of subsidiary [Contractor] by [Parent Company]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Garantie de Société Mère (la \"Garantie\") sécurise les obligations de la filiale [Contractor] par [Société Mère]..."}]}

name: Project-Specific Joint Venture
description: Temporary partnership formed specifically for a single construction project
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese projektspezifische Joint Venture Vereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die temporäre Partnerschaft für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Project-Specific Joint Venture Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the temporary partnership for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Coentreprise Spécifique au Projet (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit le partenariat temporaire pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Integrated Design-Build
description: Collaborative approach with integrated design and construction teams
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser integrierte Design-Build Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Zusammenarbeit zwischen Planungs- und Bautrupps für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Integrated Design-Build Contract (the \"Contract\") governs the collaboration between design and construction teams for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat Conception-Construction Intégrée (le \"Contrat\") régit la collaboration entre les équipes de conception et construction pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Site Management and Support
description: Subcontracts for site management, security, supervision, and support services
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Baustellenmanagement- und Unterstützungsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Baustellenverwaltung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Site Management and Support (the \"Agreement\") governs site management for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Gestion de Site et Support (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la gestion de site pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Unit Price Contracts
description: Contracts based on unit prices for measured quantities with detailed bill of quantities
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser Einheitspreis-Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") basiert auf Einheitspreisen für gemessene Mengen gemäß Leistungsverzeichnis..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Unit Price Contract (the \"Contract\") is based on unit prices for measured quantities according to bill of quantities..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat à Prix Unitaire (le \"Contrat\") est basé sur des prix unitaires pour des quantités mesurées selon le métré..."}]}

name: Non-Disclosure Agreements (NDAs)
description: Confidentiality agreements protecting proprietary information, trade secrets, and sensitive project data
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Geheimhaltungsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") schützt vertrauliche Informationen zwischen [Partei A] und [Partei B]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Non-Disclosure Agreement (the \"Agreement\") protects confidential information between [Party A] and [Party B]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Non-Divulgation (l\"\"Accord\"\") protège les informations confidentielles entre [Partie A] et [Partie B]..."}]}

name: Design-Bid-Build
description: Sequential process where design is completed before construction bidding
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser Design-Bid-Build Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die sequenzielle Abfolge von Planung, Ausschreibung und Bau für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Design-Bid-Build Contract (the \"Contract\") governs the sequential process of design, bidding, and construction for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat Conception-Soumission-Construction (le \"Contrat\") régit le processus séquentiel de conception, soumission et construction pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Service Level Agreements (SLAs)
description: Performance-based agreements defining service quality standards, response times, and availability requirements
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Service Level Vereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") definiert Leistungsstandards und Verfügbarkeitsanforderungen für [Service]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Service Level Agreement (the \"Agreement\") defines performance standards and availability requirements for [Service]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Niveau de Service (l\"\"Accord\"\") définit les normes de performance et les exigences de disponibilité pour [Service]..."}]}

name: Quantity Surveying / Cost Management
description: Cost planning, budgeting, and financial management services for construction projects
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Kostenplanungs- und Mengenermittlungsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Kostenplanung und Budgetverwaltung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Quantity Surveying / Cost Management (the \"Agreement\") governs cost planning and budget management for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Métreur / Gestion des Coûts (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la planification des coûts et la gestion budgétaire pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Blanket Purchase Agreements
description: Pre-negotiated agreements allowing multiple purchases up to a specified limit
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Pauschalabnahmevereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt wiederholte Käufe bis zu [Limit] für [Kategorien]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Blanket Purchase Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs repeated purchases up to [Limit] for [Categories]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord d\"Achat Global (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit les achats répétés jusqu\"à [Limite] pour [Catégories]..."}]}

name: Ready-Mix Concrete Supply
description: Supply of ready-mix concrete with specific strength and quality requirements
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Fertigbetonlieferung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Betonlieferung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Ready-Mix Concrete Supply (the \"Agreement\") governs concrete supply for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Approvisionnement en Béton Prêt à l\"Emploi (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"approvisionnement en béton pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Waste Removal and Disposal Services
description: Construction waste management, removal, and disposal services
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Abfallentsorgungsdienstleistungsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Abfallentsorgung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Waste Removal and Disposal Services (the \"Agreement\") governs waste disposal for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ces Services d\"Élimination des Déchets (l\"\"Accord\"\") régissent l\"élimination des déchets pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Glass Curtain Wall Systems
description: Supply and installation of glass curtain wall systems for modern buildings
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Glasfassadensystemvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Glasfassadensysteme für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Glass Curtain Wall Systems (the \"Agreement\") governs glass facade systems for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ces Systèmes de Mur-Rideau en Verre (l\"\"Accord\"\") régissent les systèmes de façade en verre pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Traditional (Bill of Quantities / Unit Price)
description: Classic procurement method with detailed specifications and competitive bidding
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser traditionelle Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") basiert auf Leistungsverzeichnis und Einheitspreisen für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Traditional Contract (the \"Contract\") is based on bill of quantities and unit prices for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat Traditionnel (le \"Contrat\") est basé sur le métré et les prix unitaires pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Bulk Purchase of Cement or Aggregates
description: Large-volume supply agreements for essential construction materials with volume discounts
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Großvolumen-Beschaffung von Zement oder Zuschlagstoffen (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Lieferung von [Materialien] in großen Mengen..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Bulk Purchase of Cement or Aggregates (the \"Agreement\") governs the supply of [Materials] in large volumes..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Achat en Vrac de Ciment ou d\"Agrégats (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"approvisionnement de [Matériaux] en gros volumes..."}]}

name: Steel Reinforcement / Rebar Supply
description: Supply of steel reinforcement bars and mesh for concrete construction
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Stahlbewehrungs-/Betonstahllieferung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Bewehrungsstahllieferung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Steel Reinforcement / Rebar Supply (the \"Agreement\") governs reinforcement steel supply for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Approvisionnement en Armature d\"Acier / Barres d\"Armature (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"approvisionnement en acier d\"armature pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Bonds, Guarantees & Insurance Contracts
description: Contracts related to financial assurances, performance bonds, guarantees, and insurance coverage
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Leistungsbürgschaft (die \"Bürgschaft\") wird von [Bürge] zugunsten von [Begünstigtem] ausgestellt, um die Leistung von [Hauptschuldner] zu garantieren..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Performance Bond (the \"Bond\") is issued by [Surety] in favor of [Obligee] to guarantee the performance of [Principal]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Caution de Bonne Exécution (la \"Caution\") est émise par [Cautionnaire] en faveur de [Bénéficiaire] pour garantir l\"exécution de [Principal]..."}]}

name: Precast Concrete Panels
description: Supply and installation of precast concrete wall and floor panels
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Fertigteilbetonplattenvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Betonfertigteilplatten für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Precast Concrete Panels (the \"Agreement\") governs precast concrete panels for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ces Panneaux de Béton Préfabriqué (l\"\"Accord\"\") régissent les panneaux de béton préfabriqué pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Structural/Civil Engineering
description: Structural and civil engineering services including foundation design and infrastructure planning
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Tragwerks- und Tiefbauingenieurdienstleistung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die strukturelle Planung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Structural/Civil Engineering (the \"Agreement\") governs structural planning for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Ingénierie Structurelle/Civile (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la planification structurelle pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Lump Sum Fixed-Price Contracts
description: Fixed-price contracts with detailed specifications and complete project scope
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser Pauschalpreis-Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die schlüsselfertige Lieferung von [Projekt] zu festem Preis..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Lump Sum Fixed-Price Contract (the \"Contract\") governs the turnkey delivery of [Project] at fixed price..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat Forfaitaire à Prix Fixe (le \"Contrat\") régit la livraison clé en main de [Projet] à prix fixe..."}]}

name: Procurement & Supply Agreements
description: Agreements for the procurement and supply of goods, materials, or services
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Beschaffungsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Lieferung von [Waren/Dienstleistungen] durch [Lieferant] an [Käufer]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Procurement Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the supply of [Goods/Services] by [Supplier] to [Buyer]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord d\"Approvisionnement (l\"\"Accord\") régit la fourniture de [Biens/Services] par [Fournisseur] à [Acheteur]..."}]}

name: Design & Build
description: Single contract approach where one entity is responsible for both design and construction
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser Design-Build-Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") überträgt sowohl Planungs- als auch Bauverantwortung an [Contractor] für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Design-Build Contract (the \"Contract\") assigns both design and construction responsibility to [Contractor] for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat Conception-Construction (le \"Contrat\") assigne la responsabilité de conception et construction à [Contractor] pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Security Services Agreement
description: Site security services including access control, monitoring, and protection
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Sicherheitsdienstleistungsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Baustellensicherheit für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Security Services Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs site security for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Services de Sécurité (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la sécurité du site pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Contractors All Risk (CAR) Insurance
description: Comprehensive insurance covering all risks during construction including material damage, theft, and third-party liability
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese CAR-Versicherung (die \"Police\") deckt alle Risiken während der Bauausführung ab, einschließlich Materialschäden und Diebstahl..."}], "en": [{"text": "This CAR Insurance (the \"Policy\") covers all risks during construction including material damage and theft..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Assurance CAR (la \"Police\") couvre tous les risques pendant la construction incluant les dommages matériels et le vol..."}]}

name: Public-Private Partnership (PPP) / Concession Agreements
description: Long-term partnerships between public and private sectors for infrastructure development and operation
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese PPP/Konzessionsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Zusammenarbeit zwischen [Öffentlicher Sektor] und [Privatem Sektor] für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This PPP/Concession Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the partnership between [Public Sector] and [Private Sector] for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord PPP/Concession (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit le partenariat entre [Secteur Public] et [Secteur Privé] pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Insurance Policies
description: Comprehensive insurance coverage for construction projects including various risk categories
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Versicherungspolice (die \"Police\") bietet umfassenden Versicherungsschutz für [Projekt] mit Deckung von [Risikokategorien]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Insurance Policy (the \"Policy\") provides comprehensive coverage for [Project] including [Risk Categories]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Police d\"Assurance (la \"Police\") offre une couverture complète pour [Projet] incluant [Catégories de Risque]..."}]}

name: Crane Rental Agreement
description: Specialized crane rental and operation services for heavy lifting operations
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Kranmietvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Kranvermietung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Crane Rental Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs crane rental for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Location de Grue (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la location de grue pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Scaffolding Supply and Installation
description: Temporary scaffolding systems for construction access and safety
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Gerüstlieferungs- und Montagevereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Gerüstsysteme für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Scaffolding Supply and Installation (the \"Agreement\") governs scaffolding systems for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Approvisionnement et Installation d\"Échafaudage (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit les systèmes d\"échafaudage pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Main Contracts
description: Primary contracts governing core business relationships and major transactions
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser Hauptvertrag (der \"Vertrag\") begründet die primäre Geschäftsbeziehung zwischen [Partei A] und [Partei B]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Main Contract (the \"Agreement\") establishes the primary business relationship between [Party A] and [Party B]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat Principal (l\"\"Accord\") établit la relation commerciale principale entre [Partie A] et [Partie B]..."}]}

name: Fire Protection / Sprinkler Installation
description: Specialized fire protection systems and sprinkler installation services
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Brandschutz-/Sprinkleranlagenvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Brandschutzsysteme für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Fire Protection / Sprinkler Installation (the \"Agreement\") governs fire protection systems for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Installation de Protection Incendie / Gicleurs (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit les systèmes de protection incendie pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Workers Compensation Insurance
description: Insurance covering workplace injuries, occupational diseases, and related medical expenses for construction workers
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Unfallversicherung (die \"Police\") deckt Arbeitsunfälle und Berufskrankheiten von Bauarbeitern ab..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Workers Compensation Insurance (the \"Policy\") covers workplace injuries and occupational diseases of construction workers..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Assurance Accidents du Travail (la \"Police\") couvre les blessures au travail et les maladies professionnelles des ouvriers de construction..."}]}

name: Quality Assurance and Inspection Services
description: Comprehensive quality control and inspection services throughout construction
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Qualitätssicherungs- und Prüfdienstleistung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Qualitätskontrolle für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Quality Assurance and Inspection Services (the \"Agreement\") governs quality control for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ces Services d\"Assurance Qualité et d\"Inspection (l\"\"Accord\"\") régissent le contrôle qualité pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Build-Own-Operate (BOO) / Build-Transfer-Operate (BTO)
description: Long-term infrastructure contracts where the contractor builds, owns, and operates the facility, with optional transfer to the client
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser BOO/BTO-Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") regelt den Bau, Besitz und Betrieb der [Anlage] durch [Contractor] für [Client]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This BOO/BTO Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the construction, ownership, and operation of [Facility] by [Contractor] for [Client]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord BOO/BTO (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la construction, la propriété et l\"exploitation de [Installation] par [Contractor] pour [Client]..."}]}

name: Cost-Plus EPC
description: EPC contract with cost-plus pricing structure and transparent cost accounting
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser Cost-Plus EPC Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Kostentransparenz und Gebührenberechnung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Cost-Plus EPC Contract (the \"Contract\") governs cost transparency and fee calculation for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat EPC Coût Plus (le \"Contrat\") régit la transparence des coûts et le calcul des frais pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: MEP Engineering
description: Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing engineering services for building systems
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese MEP-Ingenieurdienstleistung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die technische Gebäudeausrüstung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This MEP Engineering (the \"Agreement\") governs building services engineering for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Ingénierie MEP (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"ingénierie des services du bâtiment pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Earth-Moving Machinery Lease
description: Heavy machinery rental for excavation, earthworks, and site preparation
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Erdbewegungsmaschinenmiete (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Maschinenvermietung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Earth-Moving Machinery Lease (the \"Agreement\") governs machinery rental for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Location de Machinerie de Terrassement (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la location de machinerie pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Materials Supply
description: Supply of construction materials including aggregates, concrete, and steel
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Materiallieferungsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Materiallieferung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Materials Supply (the \"Agreement\") governs material supply for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Approvisionnement en Matériaux (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"approvisionnement en matériaux pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Engineering Consultancy Agreement
description: Technical engineering services including design, analysis, and project management
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Ingenieursberatungsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die technischen Dienstleistungen von [Ingenieur] für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Engineering Consultancy Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the technical services of [Engineer] for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Conseil en Ingénierie (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit les services techniques d\"[Ingénieur] pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Advance Payment Guarantee
description: Financial guarantee securing advance payments made to contractors before work commencement
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Anzahlungsgarantie (die \"Garantie\") sichert die Anzahlung von [Betrag] an [Contractor] für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Advance Payment Guarantee (the \"Guarantee\") secures the advance payment of [Amount] to [Contractor] for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Garantie d\"Acompte (la \"Garantie\") sécurise l\"acompte de [Montant] à [Contractor] pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: On-Demand Delivery of Aggregates
description: Flexible delivery system for construction aggregates based on immediate project needs
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese On-Demand Lieferung von Zuschlagstoffen (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die flexible Lieferung von [Zuschlagstoffen] nach Bedarf..."}], "en": [{"text": "This On-Demand Delivery of Aggregates (the \"Agreement\") governs the flexible delivery of [Aggregates] as needed..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Livraison à la Demande d\"Agrégats (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la livraison flexible d\"[Agrégats] selon les besoins..."}]}

name: Specialty Services
description: Subcontracts for specialized construction services including fire protection, testing, and waterproofing
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Spezialdienstleistungsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt spezialisierte Bauleistungen für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Specialty Services (the \"Agreement\") governs specialized construction services for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ces Services Spécialisés (l\"\"Accord\"\") régissent les services de construction spécialisés pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: CM at Risk
description: Construction manager provides guaranteed maximum price and assumes construction risk
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese CM at Risk Vereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Garantie des Höchstpreises durch den Bauprojektmanager für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This CM at Risk Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the guaranteed maximum price by the construction manager for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord CM à Risque (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit le prix maximum garanti par le gestionnaire de construction pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Steel Fixtures Procurement
description: Specialized procurement agreements for steel components and structural elements
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Stahlbeschaffung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Lieferung von [Stahlkomponenten] nach technischen Spezifikationen..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Steel Fixtures Procurement (the \"Agreement\") governs the supply of [Steel Components] according to technical specifications..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Approvisionnement en Éléments d\"Acier (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"approvisionnement de [Composants d\"Acier] selon les spécifications techniques..."}]}

name: Subcontracts
description: Contracts between a prime contractor and a subcontractor for specific portions of work
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Unterauftragsvereinbarung (der \"Unterauftrag\") wird zwischen [Hauptauftragnehmer] und [Unterauftragnehmer] geschlossen..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Subcontract Agreement (the \"Subcontract\") is entered into between [Prime Contractor] and [Subcontractor]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Sous-traitance (le \"Sous-contrat\") est conclu entre [Entrepreneur Principal] et [Sous-traitant]..."}]}

name: Supplier Subcontracts
description: Subcontracts for supply of materials, equipment, and prefabricated components
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Lieferantenunterauftragsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Lieferung von Materialien und Ausrüstung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Supplier Subcontract (the \"Agreement\") governs the supply of materials and equipment for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Sous-contrat de Fournisseur (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"approvisionnement en matériaux et équipements pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Architectural Services Agreement
description: Professional services for architectural design, planning, and project oversight
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Architektenleistungsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die professionellen Dienstleistungen von [Architekt] für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Architectural Services Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the professional services of [Architect] for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Services Architecturaux (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit les services professionnels d\"[Architecte] pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Agency CM
description: Construction manager acts as agent for owner without construction risk or cost guarantees
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Agentur-Bauprojektmanagement Vereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Agenturrolle des Bauprojektmanagers für [Owner]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Agency CM Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the agency role of the construction manager for [Owner]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord CM Agence (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit le rôle d\"agence du gestionnaire de construction pour [Owner]..."}]}

name: Framework / Call-Off Agreements
description: Flexible procurement arrangements allowing multiple orders under a single master agreement
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Rahmenvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die flexible Beschaffung von [Waren/Dienstleistungen] durch [Käufer] von [Lieferant]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Framework Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the flexible procurement of [Goods/Services] by [Buyer] from [Supplier]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord Cadre (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"approvisionnement flexible de [Biens/Services] par [Acheteur] auprès de [Fournisseur]..."}]}

name: Testing & Commissioning Subcontract
description: Specialized testing and commissioning services for building systems
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Prüfungs- und Inbetriebnahmevereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Systemprüfungen für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Testing & Commissioning Subcontract (the \"Agreement\") governs system testing for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Sous-contrat d\"Essais et de Mise en Service (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit les essais de système pour [Projet]..."}]}
name_tr: Test ve Devreye Alma Alt Sözleşmesi

name: Cost Planning and Budgeting
description: Comprehensive cost planning and budget management throughout project lifecycle
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Kostenplanungs- und Budgetierungsdienstleistung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Kostenplanung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Cost Planning and Budgeting (the \"Agreement\") governs cost planning for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Planification des Coûts et Budgétisation (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la planification des coûts pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Environmental Impact Assessment
description: Comprehensive environmental impact studies and regulatory compliance services
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Umweltverträglichkeitsprüfung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Umweltauswirkungen für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Environmental Impact Assessment (the \"Agreement\") governs environmental impacts for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Évaluation d\"Impact Environnemental (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit les impacts environnementaux pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Brick / Block / Aggregate Supply
description: Supply of basic construction materials including bricks, blocks, and aggregates
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Ziegel-/Block-/Zuschlagstofflieferung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Grundbaustofflieferung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Brick / Block / Aggregate Supply (the \"Agreement\") governs basic material supply for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Approvisionnement en Briques / Blocs / Agrégats (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"approvisionnement en matériaux de base pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Equipment Rental & Maintenance Agreements
description: Contracts for renting construction equipment and machinery with maintenance and support services
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser Gerätemietvertrag (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Vermietung von [Gerätetyp] durch [Vermieter] an [Mieter] mit Wartungsdienstleistungen..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Equipment Rental Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the rental of [Equipment Type] by [Lessor] to [Lessee] with maintenance services..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Location d\"Équipement (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la location de [Type d\"Équipement] par [Bailleur] à [Locataire] avec services de maintenance..."}]}

name: Service Subcontracts
description: Subcontracts for various construction services including management, specialty work, and trade services
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Dienstleistungsunterauftragsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die verschiedenen Bauleistungen für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Service Subcontract (the \"Agreement\") governs various construction services for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Sous-contrat de Services (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit les différents services de construction pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Soil Investigation and Analysis
description: Geotechnical soil analysis and foundation design recommendations
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Bodenuntersuchung und -analyse (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die geotechnische Analyse für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Soil Investigation and Analysis (the \"Agreement\") governs geotechnical analysis for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Investigation et Analyse du Sol (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"analyse géotechnique pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Construction Management
description: Project delivery method where construction manager provides professional services and may also act as constructor
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser Bauprojektmanagement-Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die professionellen Dienstleistungen des Bauprojektmanagers für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Construction Management Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the professional services of the construction manager for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Gestion de Construction (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit les services professionnels du gestionnaire de construction pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Health & Safety / Site-Supervision
description: On-site supervision and health & safety management services
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Gesundheits- und Sicherheitsaufsicht (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Baustellenaufsicht und Sicherheitsmanagement für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Health & Safety / Site-Supervision (the \"Agreement\") governs site supervision and safety management for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Supervision Santé & Sécurité / Site (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la supervision de site et la gestion de sécurité pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Site Safety Monitoring
description: Continuous safety monitoring and compliance management on construction sites
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Baustellensicherheitsüberwachung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Sicherheitskontrolle für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Site Safety Monitoring (the \"Agreement\") governs safety control for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Surveillance de Sécurité de Site (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit le contrôle de sécurité pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Other Specialized Contract Forms
description: Various other specialized contract forms for unique business situations or industry-specific needs
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser Spezialvertrag (der \"Vertrag\") ist für [Bestimmten Zweck] konzipiert und enthält [Besondere Bestimmungen]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Specialized Contract (the \"Agreement\") is designed for [Specific Purpose] and includes [Special Provisions]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat Spécialisé (l\"\"Accord\") est conçu pour [Usage Spécifique] et inclut [Dispositions Spéciales]..."}]}

name: Health, Safety and Environment (HSE) Protocols
description: Agreements establishing health, safety, and environmental standards and procedures for construction projects
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese HSE-Vereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") legt Gesundheits-, Sicherheits- und Umweltstandards für [Projekt] fest..."}], "en": [{"text": "This HSE Protocol Agreement (the \"Agreement\") establishes health, safety, and environmental standards for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Protocole HSE (l\"\"Accord\"\") établit les normes de santé, sécurité et environnement pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Just-In-Time Delivery Agreement
description: Agreements for precise timing of material deliveries to minimize inventory and storage costs
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Just-in-Time Liefervereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die präzise zeitliche Lieferung von [Materialien] für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Just-In-Time Delivery Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the precise timing of [Materials] delivery for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Livraison Juste-à-Temps (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit le timing précis de livraison de [Matériaux] pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Lump-Sum Turnkey EPC
description: Fixed-price EPC contract with complete project delivery responsibility
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser Pauschalpreis Turnkey EPC Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die schlüsselfertige Lieferung für [Projekt] zu festem Preis..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Lump-Sum Turnkey EPC Contract (the \"Contract\") governs turnkey delivery for [Project] at fixed price..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat EPC Forfaitaire Clé en Main (le \"Contrat\") régit la livraison clé en main pour [Projet] à prix fixe..."}]}

name: Master Framework for Repeat Orders
description: Comprehensive framework agreements for ongoing procurement relationships
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Master-Rahmenvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die fortlaufende Beschaffungsbeziehung zwischen [Käufer] und [Lieferant]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Master Framework Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the ongoing procurement relationship between [Buyer] and [Supplier]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord Cadre Principal (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la relation d\"approvisionnement continue entre [Acheteur] et [Fournisseur]..."}]}

name: Scheduled Fuel or Lubricant Supply
description: Precisely timed delivery of fuel and lubricants for construction equipment and vehicles
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese geplante Kraftstoff- und Schmierstofflieferung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die zeitgenaue Lieferung für [Baumaschinen]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Scheduled Fuel or Lubricant Supply (the \"Agreement\") governs the precisely timed delivery for [Construction Equipment]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Approvisionnement Programmé en Carburant ou Lubrifiant (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la livraison précisément programmée pour [Équipement de Construction]..."}]}

name: Electrical Installation Subcontract
description: Electrical systems installation including wiring, fixtures, and electrical equipment
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Elektroinstallationsunterauftragsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Elektroinstallation für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Electrical Installation Subcontract (the \"Agreement\") governs electrical installation for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Sous-contrat d\"Installation Électrique (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"installation électrique pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Consortium Agreements
description: Long-term strategic partnerships for multiple projects and ongoing collaboration
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Konsortialvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die strategische Partnerschaft zwischen [Partei A] und [Partei B] für mehrere Projekte..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Consortium Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the strategic partnership between [Party A] and [Party B] for multiple projects..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Consortium (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit le partenariat stratégique entre [Partie A] et [Partie B] pour plusieurs projets..."}]}

name: Trade Contractors
description: Subcontracts for specific trade work including electrical, HVAC, and plumbing installations
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Gewerkeunterauftragsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt spezifische Gewerksarbeiten für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Trade Contractors (the \"Agreement\") governs specific trade work for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ces Entrepreneurs de Métier (l\"\"Accord\"\") régissent le travail de métier spécifique pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Conceptual Design and Planning
description: Initial design phase including concept development, feasibility studies, and master planning
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Konzeptentwicklungs- und Planungsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die initiale Entwurfsphase für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Conceptual Design and Planning (the \"Agreement\") governs the initial design phase for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Conception Conceptuelle et Planification (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la phase de conception initiale pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Prefabricated Components
description: Supply and installation of prefabricated building components and systems
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Fertigteilkomponentenvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Fertigteilkomponenten für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Prefabricated Components (the \"Agreement\") governs prefabricated components for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ces Composants Préfabriqués (l\"\"Accord\"\") régissent les composants préfabriqués pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Professional / Technical Services Contracts
description: Agreements for professional or technical services including consulting, engineering, and specialized expertise
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Vereinbarung über professionelle Dienstleistungen (der \"Vertrag\") wird für die Erbringung von [Dienstleistungsart] durch [Dienstleister] geschlossen..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Professional Services Agreement (the \"Agreement\") is entered into for the provision of [Service Type] by [Service Provider]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Services Professionnels (l\"\"Accord\") est conclu pour la fourniture de [Type de Service] par [Fournisseur de Service]..."}]}

name: Performance Bond / Guarantee
description: Financial guarantee ensuring contractor performance and completion of contractual obligations
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Leistungsbürgschaft (die \"Bürgschaft\") sichert die ordnungsgemäße Ausführung von [Projekt] durch [Contractor]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Performance Bond (the \"Bond\") secures the proper execution of [Project] by [Contractor]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Caution de Bonne Exécution (la \"Caution\") sécurise l\"exécution correcte de [Projet] par [Contractor]..."}]}

name: Waterproofing / Roofing Specialists
description: Specialized waterproofing and roofing installation and repair services
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Abdichtungs-/Dachfacharbeitervereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Abdichtungsarbeiten für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Waterproofing / Roofing Specialists (the \"Agreement\") governs waterproofing work for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ces Spécialistes d\"Étanchéité / Toiture (l\"\"Accord\"\") régissent les travaux d\"étanchéité pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Equipment Delivery / Leasing
description: Supply and leasing of construction equipment and machinery
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Gerätelieferungs- und Leasingvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Ausrüstungslieferung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Equipment Delivery / Leasing (the \"Agreement\") governs equipment supply for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Livraison d\"Équipement / Location (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"approvisionnement en équipement pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Bid Bond
description: Financial guarantee ensuring bidder will enter into contract if awarded and provide required performance bond
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Angebotssicherheit (die \"Sicherheit\") gewährleistet, dass der Bieter den Vertrag abschließt, falls er den Zuschlag erhält..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Bid Bond (the \"Bond\") ensures the bidder will enter into contract if awarded and provide required performance bond..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Caution d\"Offre (la \"Caution\") garantit que le soumissionnaire conclura le contrat s\"il est attribué et fournira la caution de bonne exécution requise..."}]}

name: Detailed Design and Drawings
description: Comprehensive design development including detailed drawings, specifications, and construction documents
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Detailentwurfs- und Zeichnungsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die detaillierte Planungsphase für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Detailed Design and Drawings (the \"Agreement\") governs the detailed design phase for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Conception Détaillée et Dessins (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la phase de conception détaillée pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Joint Venture Agreements
description: Collaborative arrangements between multiple parties for specific construction projects
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Joint Venture Vereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Zusammenarbeit zwischen [Partei A] und [Partei B] für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Joint Venture Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the collaboration between [Party A] and [Party B] for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord de Coentreprise (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la collaboration entre [Partie A] et [Partie B] pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Environmental / Geotechnical Consulting
description: Specialized consulting services for environmental impact and geotechnical analysis
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Umwelt- und Geotechnikberatung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die spezialisierten Dienstleistungen für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Environmental / Geotechnical Consulting (the \"Agreement\") governs specialized services for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Conseil Environnemental / Géotechnique (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit les services spécialisés pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Ancillary & Miscellaneous Contracts
description: Supporting or miscellaneous contracts that provide additional terms or fall outside main categories
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Nebenvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") ergänzt den Hauptvertrag zwischen [Parteien] und regelt [Bestimmte Bedingungen]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Ancillary Agreement (the \"Agreement\") supplements the main contract between [Parties] and addresses [Specific Terms]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord Accessoire (l\"\"Accord\") complète le contrat principal entre [Parties] et traite de [Conditions Spécifiques]..."}]}

name: Architect-Nominated Specialty Work
description: Specialty work nominated by the architect with specific design and quality requirements
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese architektnominierte Spezialarbeit (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die vom Architekten nominierte Facharbeit für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Architect-Nominated Specialty Work (the \"Agreement\") governs specialty work nominated by the architect for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Travail Spécialisé Nommé par l\"Architecte (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit le travail spécialisé nommé par l\"architecte pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Professional Indemnity Insurance
description: Insurance covering professional negligence, errors, and omissions in design and construction services
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Berufshaftpflichtversicherung (die \"Police\") deckt berufliche Fahrlässigkeit und Fehler in Planungs- und Bauleistungen ab..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Professional Indemnity Insurance (the \"Policy\") covers professional negligence and errors in design and construction services..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Assurance Responsabilité Professionnelle (la \"Police\") couvre la négligence professionnelle et les erreurs dans les services de conception et construction..."}]}

name: Maintenance, Repair & Operations (MRO) Agreements
description: Ongoing service contracts for maintenance, repair, and operational support of existing facilities
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese MRO-Vereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Wartung, Reparatur und den Betrieb von [Anlage] durch [Service Provider]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This MRO Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the maintenance, repair, and operation of [Facility] by [Service Provider]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord MRO (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit la maintenance, la réparation et l\"exploitation de [Installation] par [Fournisseur de Service]..."}]}

name: Joint Inspection / Handover Protocols
description: Procedures and agreements for joint inspections, quality control, and project handover processes
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieses gemeinsame Inspektionsprotokoll (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Qualitätskontrolle und Übergabe von [Projektphase]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Joint Inspection Protocol (the \"Agreement\") governs quality control and handover of [Project Phase]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Protocole d\"Inspection Conjointe (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit le contrôle qualité et la remise de [Phase de Projet]..."}]}

name: HVAC Subcontract
description: Heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems installation and maintenance
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese HLK-Unterauftragsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Heizungs-, Lüftungs- und Klimatechnik für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This HVAC Subcontract (the \"Agreement\") governs HVAC systems for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Sous-contrat CVC (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit les systèmes CVC pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Construction Performance Bond
description: Guarantee ensuring completion of construction work according to contract specifications and timeline
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Bauleistungsbürgschaft (die \"Bürgschaft\") gewährleistet die ordnungsgemäße Fertigstellung der Bauarbeiten gemäß Vertragsspezifikationen..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Construction Performance Bond (the \"Bond\") guarantees completion of construction work according to contract specifications..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Caution de Bonne Exécution de Construction (la \"Caution\") garantit l\"achèvement des travaux de construction selon les spécifications du contrat..."}]}

name: Plumbing and Sanitary Works Subcontract
description: Plumbing systems, sanitary installations, and water supply services
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Sanitärunterauftragsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Sanitärinstallation für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Plumbing and Sanitary Works Subcontract (the \"Agreement\") governs plumbing installation for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Sous-contrat de Plomberie et Sanitaire (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"installation de plomberie pour [Projet]..."}]}
name_tr: Tesisat ve Sıhhi Tesisat Alt Sözleşmesi

name: Valuation and Payment Certification
description: Professional valuation services and payment certification for construction progress
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Bewertungs- und Zahlungszertifizierungsdienstleistung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Fortschrittsbewertung für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Valuation and Payment Certification (the \"Agreement\") governs progress valuation for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cette Évaluation et Certification de Paiement (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"évaluation des progrès pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Modular Building Units
description: Supply and installation of prefabricated modular building components
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese Modulbauvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die Modulbaukomponenten für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Modular Building Units (the \"Agreement\") governs modular components for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ces Unités de Construction Modulaire (l\"\"Accord\"\") régissent les composants modulaires pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Engineering Procurement Installation (EPI)
description: Comprehensive contracts covering engineering design, procurement of materials/equipment, and installation services
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser EPI-Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") umfasst die Ingenieursleistungen, Beschaffung und Installation von [Anlage] für [Client]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This EPI Contract (the \"Contract\") covers engineering services, procurement, and installation of [Facility] for [Client]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat EPI (le \"Contrat\") couvre les services d\"ingénierie, l\"approvisionnement et l\"installation de [Installation] pour [Client]..."}]}

name: Client-Nominated Subcontract
description: Subcontractor nominated directly by the client for specific work packages
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese kundennominierte Unterauftragsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die vom Kunden nominierte Arbeit für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Client-Nominated Subcontract (the \"Agreement\") governs work nominated by the client for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Sous-contrat Nommé par le Client (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit le travail nommé par le client pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Long-Term Supply Agreement
description: Extended supply contracts for bulk materials and strategic resources with volume discounts
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese langfristige Liefervereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die kontinuierliche Lieferung von [Materialien] über [Zeitraum]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Long-Term Supply Agreement (the \"Agreement\") governs the continuous supply of [Materials] over [Period]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Cet Accord d\"Approvisionnement à Long Terme (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit l\"approvisionnement continu de [Matériaux] sur [Période]..."}]}

name: Nominated / Designated Subcontracts
description: Subcontracts where the subcontractor is nominated or designated by the client or architect
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Diese nominierte/beauftragte Unterauftragsvereinbarung (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die von [Client/Architekt] nominierte Arbeit für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Nominated / Designated Subcontract (the \"Agreement\") governs work nominated by [Client/Architect] for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Sous-contrat Nommé / Désigné (l\"\"Accord\"\") régit le travail nommé par [Client/Architecte] pour [Projet]..."}]}

name: Time & Materials EPC
description: EPC contract with time and materials based pricing for flexible project execution
examples: {"de": [{"text": "Dieser Zeit- und Material EPC Vertrag (der \"Vertrag\") regelt die flexible Abrechnung nach Zeit und Material für [Projekt]..."}], "en": [{"text": "This Time & Materials EPC Contract (the \"Contract\") governs flexible billing by time and materials for [Project]..."}], "fr": [{"text": "Ce Contrat EPC Temps et Matériaux (le \"Contrat\") régit la facturation flexible par temps et matériaux pour [Projet]..."}]}
